mapper.insert: insert into member (userid, userpw, name, gender, birth, address, nickname, email, phonenumber, verify1, verify2, answer1, answer2) values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{address}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phonenumber}, #{verify1}, #{verify2}, #{answer1}, #{answer2})
mapper.select: select userid from member where name = #{name}
